headline: Trade Desk Taps THG Beauty Data To Deepen Retail Media Story
summary: Trade Desk (NasdaqGM:TTD) has partnered with THG Ingenuity to bring premium retail media inventory from Cult Beauty and lookFANTASTIC onto its Kokai platform. The agreement gives advertisers new access to beauty audience segments from two major UK beauty retailers, with the integration focused on personalisation and closed loop attribution. The partnership extends Trade Desk's retail media offering to beauty brands and agencies looking to reach shoppers across channels using first party...
